notesStmt.note: Several pages partially stained. Water-damaged. Lacunae after folios 2, 3, 4.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The commentary on the book of Exodus (fragments).

collation.p:
5 quires: i? (folios 1, 2, 3, 4), xli-xliii10 (folios 5-34), xliv6 (folios 35-41). Imperfect at the end.
Signatures in Hebrew letters on the upper margin of the first page of a quire.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental semi-cursive script of the 16th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine title: 'Samuel Ha-Rofe. Comm. On Exodus. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2488.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882, folio [42v].
